text: Bhuwan Kumar Pathak (Nepali: भुवन कुमार पाठक, born 1958) is a Nepali politician who is currently serving as Speaker of Bagmati Provincial Assembly. He is a member of the Bagmati Provincial Assembly, having been elected as a proportional representative from the Khas people category in the 2022 Provincial Assembly election. == References == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Bhuwan Kumar Pathak
